message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I understand you want a larger share, but this offer is more reflective of the decreasing value over time. It's a good deal for both of us.
Considering the inflation, this is a generous offer, don't be greedy
Alice, let's be realistic. This is the last round where my offer is over 500,000 in initial value.  We both lose out if we wait any longer.
